mapper.insert: insert into CHECKIN( CHE_NO, COS_NO, ROOM_NAME, CHE_IN_TIME, CHE_IN_DATE, CHE_OUT_DATE, CHE_DETAIL) VALUES(sq_CHE_NO.nextval,#{customer.cosNo}, #{room.roomName},sysdate,#{cheInDate},#{cheOutDate},#{cheDetail})
mapper.update: update CHECKIN set CHE_OUT_TIME = sysdate where CHE_NO = #{num} and CHE_OUT_TIME is null
mapper.select: SELECT chdi.che_no, chdi.room_price, chdi.di_adult, chdi.di_child, bre.break_adult, bre.break_child, chdi.room_price + chdi.di_adult + chdi.di_child + bre.break_adult + bre.break_child AS total_price FROM (SELECT CHE_NO, room_name, room_price*count(gr_no) AS room_price, sum(GR_DI_ADULT)*#{diAdultPrice} AS di_adult, sum(GR_DI_CHILD)*#{diChildPrice} AS di_child FROM (SELECT c.che_no, c.ROOM_NAME, r.ROOM_PRICE, g.GR_NO, g.GR_STAY_SUM, g.GR_DI_ADULT, g.GR_DI_CHILD FROM GUEST_ROOM g LEFT OUTER JOIN CHECKIN c ON(c.CHE_NO = g.CHE_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN room r on(c.ROOM_NAME = r.ROOM_NAME) WHERE c.CHE_NO = #{cheNo}) GROUP BY CHE_NO, room_name, room_price) chdi JOIN (SELECT sum(BREAK_ADULT) * #{breAdultPrice} AS break_adult, sum(BREAK_CHILD)*#{breChildPrice} AS break_child, CHE_NO FROM (SELECT b.BREAK_CHILD, b.BREAK_ADULT, g.GR_NO, c.CHE_NO FROM BREAKFAST b LEFT OUTER JOIN GUEST_ROOM g on(b.CHE_NO = g.CHE_NO AND b.GR_NO = g.GR_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN CHECKIN c on(c.CHE_NO = g.CHE_NO) WHERE c.che_no = #{cheNo}) GROUP BY CHE_NO) bre ON(bre.che_no = chdi.che_no)
